object_analysis.name: Blue Mug
object_analysis.description: A standard-sized blue ceramic mug with a C-shaped handle, typically used for drinking hot beverages like coffee or tea.

shape.complex_geometry: cylindrical body with a curved handle attached to the side

context.cultural_significance: Common household item; associated with comfort and social drinking rituals.
